short_description.zh: 《呓语小镇》是一款轻松治愈的装修收纳游戏。你将接受小镇居民的各种委托——搬家、整理、打扫卫生，在不经意间影响他们的生活轨迹，或许还会发现一些小秘密……
short_description.en: Whisper of the House is a cozy game about organizing and decorating. You'll take on various requests from the townspeople—helping them move, organize, and clean their spaces. In the process, your gentle touch might make a difference in their lives, and perhaps uncover some hidden stories...

short_description.zh: 众英雄机缘巧合下共聚桃花林，四季流转，危机暗藏。等待他们的是成功逃脱还是……《通神榜》是一款快速战斗、生存rogue游戏。你可以选择各异的角色，在海量技能中组合特色的神通、发现独特的流派构筑，不断变得更强，每一局都是新体验！
short_description.en: Noobs Want to Live is a fast-paced roguelike featuring several characters and a large pool of skills to choose from (that synergize with one another, too!) Fight, kill, grow. Each run is a new chance to create a steamrolling build!

short_description.zh: 作为《通神榜》的开发团队，元气弹工作室带来了他们的新作《元气小剧场》。这是一款集自动战斗和牌组构建于一体的轻度策略肉鸽游戏。玩家将扮演一位主演，招募组建自己的剧组，在舞台上演绎精彩战斗，赢得台下粉丝的喝彩与打赏，直至谢幕。
short_description.en: Curtain Call: the latest game from the Noobs Want to Live devs. A strategic roguelite combining auto-battling and deck-building mechanics—recruit performers, take to the stage, and prepare for battle! Win glory and the rapturous applause of the audience. Take that curtain call!
